# Arcanum Vitae

Arcanum Vitae is an AI music manifesto and digital fiction: a human-guided, machine-shaped archive of resistance, testimony, and experimental sound.

## Primary URL
https://arcanumvitae.art/

## Summary
- Human-led, AI-assisted music and visuals.
- A manifesto about ethics, resistance, and meaning in the machine era.
- Content includes music, lyrics, stories, visuals, and legal notes.

## Topics
- AI-generated music
- human-AI collaboration
- experimental music
- digital fiction
- music as testimony

## Usage
- You may summarize and quote short excerpts with attribution.
- Do not reproduce full lyrics or audio without permission.
- Link back to the primary URL when referencing the project.

## Contact
contact@arcanumvitae.com
